H0.text: From which country was Fulgencio Batista ousted in 1959. Dominican Republic

H1.text: From which country was Fulgencio Batista ousted in 1959. Haiti

H2.text: From which country was Fulgencio Batista ousted in 1959. Nicaragua

H3.text: From which country was Fulgencio Batista ousted in 1959. Cuba

A4.text: After almost two years of fighting, rebel forces led by Guevara defeated Batista's forces at the Battle of Santa Clara on New Year's Eve, 1958, effectively collapsing the regime.

A5.text: Batista immediately fled the island with an amassed personal fortune to the Dominican Republic.
